unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Diwali Boost!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Diwali Boost!**

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that flat in Andheri, Mumbai? Good news! Banks are rolling out some sweet deals on home loans, just in time for Diwali! SBI, HDFC, and ICICI Bank are all offering competitive interest rates, starting from as low as 8.5% for eligible borrowers.
normalised: Thinking of finally buying that flat in Andheri, Mumbai? Good news! Banks are rolling out some sweet deals on home loans, just in time for Diwali! S B I, H D F C, and I C I C I Bank are all offering competitive interest rates, starting from as low as eight point five percent for eligible borrowers.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that several schemes waive processing fees until 31/12/2024, which can save you a significant chunk of change, maybe even enough for that Ganesha idol you had your eye on! Plus, some schemes are offering longer repayment tenures, up to 30 years, making those EMIs a little less scary.
normalised: Word on the street is that several schemes waive processing fees until thirty first december two thousand and twenty four, which can save you a significant chunk of change, maybe even enough for that Ganesha idol you had your eye on! Plus, some schemes are offering longer repayment tenures, up to thirty years, making those E M I s a little less scary.

unnormalised: Neha Sharma, a loan officer at HDFC, mentioned that there's been a 20% increase in inquiries since last week. "People are keen to finalize deals before the auspicious time of 11:00 hrs on Diwali day," she said. Remember to shop around and compare offers before signing on the dotted line. Don't forget to check out schemes like PMAY to get some additional subsidy. Last date to apply is 15/08/2025. Happy house hunting and Shubh Diwali!
normalised: Neha Sharma, a loan officer at H D F C, mentioned that there's been a twenty percent increase in inquiries since last week. "People are keen to finalize deals before the auspicious time of eleven hundred hours on Diwali day," she said. Remember to shop around and compare offers before signing on the dotted line. Don't forget to check out schemes like P M A Y to get some additional subsidy. Last date to apply is fifteenth august two thousand and twenty five. Happy house hunting and Shubh Diwali!
